strings.Value: ...to the greenish portal leading to Lamashtu's shrine.
...to the bluish portal leading to Varnhold.
...to the shining portal leading to Oleg's Trading Post.
...to the purplish portal leading to the depths of Trobold.
...to the silver portal leading to Irovetti's palace in the heart of Pitax.
...to the reddish portal leading to the Rostland borderlands.
...to the golden portal leading back to the capital.
...to the whitish portal leading to the Everblooming Flower Cradle.
...away from the portals of the First World.
… to the black and white portal leading to Sorrowflow.

Traveling through a kingdom that's been half "swallowed" by the {g|First World}First World{/g} is a dangerous, unpredictable affair, but our hero{mf||ine} didn't have much choice — {mf||s}he had to save {mf|his|her} lands (or at least what was left of them!) as quickly as possible. In the final hour, when every minute counted, {name} decided the only chance was to try something risky and unreliable — magic portals leading through the First World.
Summoning all {mf|his|her} courage, {name} took a daring step...
Sadly, the vicious {g|LanternKing}Lantern King{/g}'s curse placed a heavy burden on our leader's shoulders. And yet, even barely standing, {name} wouldn't abandon {mf|his|her} duty!

After defeating several enemies, our leader felt a surge of energy — the curse was growing weaker! If we could manage to help a few more allies out of trouble, maybe it would be possible to eliminate the curse entirely!

One last step was all that prevented our leader from shaking the {g|LanternKing}Lantern King{/g}'s curse from {mf|his|her} shoulders. Finding and retrieving the last missing piece of the kingdom — that's what drove our hero{mf||ine} onward!

Familiar sensations seized the {mf|king|queen} as {mf||s}he stepped into the helpfully opened portal. Strange visions of the {g|First World}First World{/g} surrounded our hero{mf||ine} — then disappeared the moment {mf||s}he reached {mf|his|her} destination and emerged into our reality!

The journey to the capital was uneventful — well, as uneventful as possible when you're traveling through the {g|First World}First World{/g}! Luckily avoiding encounters with otherworldly monsters or becoming lost along treacherous paths in another reality, {name} found a suitable portal and was soon standing at the entrance to the capital!
